entry.title: When the Sun Leaves the Sunflower
entry.summary:
Author: Kabijuu

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,054Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 2

Summary: You‚Äôre gonna be okay, Buck. Remember that. They‚Äôre gonna need you. I love you, kid," was killing him alive. First, he would never be okay. Bobby was the best thing that ever happened to him. The first time he knew he had someone he could call, and who would care enough to pick up every time‚Äîthat was the thing that made him okay. He can't live without him. Second, they‚Äôre gonna need him? No, the only person they need is Bobby. Bobby was always the sun, the center, and the heart of the station. Buck can't be any of that. He can't be loved in that way. And third, he never said it back. He did not say "I love you too" back.And he never will. Or Buck extremely crashes out. *Please note that everyone has their own way of giving up. For some people, they will look very okay, function, thrive, be a better friend than they used to be and even get good grades or promotion. And the next day, they just give up. This is fanfic about that.

entry.title: a lack of a goodbye kiss
entry.summary:
Author: maydecember

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,332Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: ‚ÄúMwah.‚Äù The sound of Eddie kissing Chris on the forehead. ‚ÄúMwah.‚Äù The sound of Eddie kissing Maddie on the cheek. ‚ÄúMwah.‚Äù The sound of Eddie blowing a kiss to Jee and Robby. ‚ÄúBye, man. See you later.‚Äù The sound of Eddie talking to Chimney. Buck waits for his turn, smile wide. And then‚ÄîEddie waves the Buckley-Han‚Äôs goodbye, telling them to come visit again soon. Buck gawks, frozen in place. He skipped him.Buck and Eddie are both extremely dramatic.

entry.title: Better The Devil You Know, Than The Devil You Don't...
entry.summary:
Author: InterrogateTheCat

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 64,456Chapters: 20/50Kudos: 720

Summary: Lucifer made a deal with the Buckley's, he will save Daniel and they take in and love his son Evan as their own. When the Buckley parents don't follow through with their side of the deal, Lucifer brings Evan with him to LA. This is the story of Evan Buckley the Son of the Devil, The Prince of Hell. Note:First 2 Chapters go through his life before the 118.Chapter 3 he is with the 118.Chapter 4 is when Eddie arrives. [You don't really need to watch Lucifer, but it would be helpful, but enough context will be supplied.] This is mostly in 911 universe, with comments and references from the Lucifer universe. ü´£ü§≠ üòà üî™ üöí üöî ü™Ω

entry.title: And If I Drown, What Then?
entry.summary:
Author: Allypop_84

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,389Chapters: 5/12Kudos: 164

Summary: Post-lawsuit, Buck fights to reclaim his place at the 118. But the team he came back for doesn‚Äôt quite feel like home anymore, and the distance between him and Eddie keeps widening. Buck feels himself slowly disappearing - first from the team, then from himself. He's always been good at saving other people. He's never been good at saving himself. Or A Buck and Eddie post-lawsuit fic. ----------- Please heed the tags! This fic explores alcohol and substance abuse and may be triggering for some readers. entry.title: The Other Buckley
entry.summary:
Author: villayuly1987

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,928Chapters: 2/10Kudos: 24

Summary: When the Buckleys decide their daughter belongs in an institution, Evan Buckley makes a choice. He chooses his sister. Andrea Buckley has cerebral palsy. She uses a wheelchair, sometimes a walker. She laughs loud, talks fast, and refuses to be reduced to a diagnosis. She is Evan‚Äôs whole heart. The night their parents try to send her away, Evan packs her bags, takes the keys, and drives toward Los Angeles with no plan and no backup. He becomes her brother, her guardian, her steady ground. Years later at the 118, his instincts with adaptive care and kids finally make sense to everyone else. Slow burn. Found family. And maybe something more with Eddie Diaz.

entry.title: Gardens Are a Cut Throat Business [so is love]
entry.summary:
Author: sassay

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,968Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 49

Summary: Eddie stares at the massive display in front of him in horror. How are there so many different kinds of fertiliser? And of course Pepa isn't answering his calls to ask which one she wants for her roses. Eddie closes his eyes and pinches the bridge of his nose. Evan didn't become a firefighter, instead he studied horticulture and botanicals, starting his own business in sustainable, green landscaping. He meets Eddie having a crisis in the fertiliser section of the local nursery and things grow..Buck loves his new house, his landscaping skills come in handy as he completely reworks his bare yard. His neighbours seem nice too - Chris is inquisitive and clever and his step-mum, Carla is friendly as well. An alternative universe meet-cute and slow burn romance along with missed moments, arguments, misunderstandings and a series of events where no one realises that Evan and Buck are the same person also known as the Gardener Buck AU.

Author: ALittleSideProject

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 74,231Chapters: 21/34Kudos: 220

Summary: And all of that was why, on their seventeenth day on Mars, Buck had shoved Eddie out of the way during the emergency evacuation, knowing it meant his own death instead of Eddie‚Äôs. Buck trusted Eddie to help get everyone else home, and Eddie had someone to go home for. Someone who needed him and loved him. Someone who Buck loved, even without ever meeting. He wasn‚Äôt going to let Chris grow up without a father. So in the split second he had to think after seeing the communications dish flying at them through the storm that was chasing them off the planet fourteen days early, he‚Äôd pushed Eddie out of the way, hoping like hell it would be enough and knowing he wouldn‚Äôt live long enough to find out. -- Or, when their mission to Mars goes wrong, Buck gets stranded and the rest of the crew does everything they can to save him. | Fic is complete at ~120k words and posting 2-3x a week as I edit.
